scenario.name: send a call then hanup
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field1 line="[$line]"]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [field0 line="[$line]"] <sip:[field0 line="[$line]"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: [field1 line="[$line]"] <sip:[field1 line="[$line]"]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:[field0 line="[$line]"]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:[field1 line="[$line]"]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [field0 line="[$line]"] <sip:[field0 line="[$line]"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: [field1 line="[$line]"] <sip:[field1 line="[$line]"]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:[field0 line="[$line]"]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[field1 line="[$line]"]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [field0 line="[$line]"] <sip:[field0 line="[$line]"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: [field1 line="[$line]"] <sip:[field1 line="[$line]"]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:[field0 line="[$line]"]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
